flavorText.text:
２ほんの　しっぽを　スクリューの
ように　まわして　およぐ。もぐる
ときは　うきぶくろが　しぼむ。

くびの　うきぶくろを　ふくらませ
すいめんから　かおを　だして
あたりの　ようすを　うかがっている。

２ほんの　しっぽを　スクリューの
ように　まわして　およぐ。もぐる
ときは　うきぶくろが　しぼむ。

くびの　うきぶくろを　ふくらませ
すいめんから　かおを　だして
あたりの　ようすを　うかがっている。

2개의 꼬리를 스크루처럼
돌려서 헤엄친다. 잠수할 때는
공기주머니가 오그라든다.

목의 부낭을 부풀려
수면에서 얼굴을 내밀어
주변의 상황을 살피고 있다.

2개의 꼬리를 스크루처럼
돌려서 헤엄친다. 잠수할 때는
부낭이 오그라든다.

목의 부낭을 부풀려
수면에서 얼굴을 내밀어
주변의 상황을 살피고 있다.

Il utilise ses deux queues comme
une hélice pour se propulser sous
l’eau et trancher les algues.

Il utilise ses deux queues comme
une hélice pour se propulser sous
l’eau et trancher les algues.

Il nage en faisant tournoyer ses deux queues comme
une hélice. Sa bouée s’affaisse quand il plonge.

Il utilise la bouée autour de son cou pour passer
sa tête hors de l’eau et observer les alentours.

Il nage en faisant tournoyer ses deux queues comme
une hélice. Sa bouée s’affaisse quand il plonge.

Il utilise la bouée autour de son cou pour passer sa tête hors
de l’eau et observer les alentours.

Es schwimmt, indem es seine beiden Schweife wie
eine Schiffsschraube rotieren lässt.

Es füllt den Schwimmreifen um seinen Hals mit Luft,
um den Kopf über dem Wasser zu halten und
die Umgebung zu überblicken.

Es schwimmt, indem es seine beiden Schweife wie eine
Schiffsschraube rotieren lässt.

Es füllt den Schwimmreifen um seinen Hals mit Luft,
um den Kopf über dem Wasser zu halten und die Umgebung
zu überblicken.

Nada rotando sus dos colas a modo de tornillo.
Cuando bucea, el flotador se pliega.

Hincha el flotador de su cuello para flotar y saca la
cabeza de la superficie del agua para explorar sus
alrededores.

Nada rotando sus dos colas a modo de tornillo. Cuando
bucea, el flotador se pliega.

Hincha el flotador de su cuello para flotar y saca la cabeza
de la superficie del agua para explorar sus alrededores.

Nuota roteando le due code come fossero viti.
Quando si immerge, il suo galleggiante si sgonfia.

Gonfia il salvagente che ha attorno al collo per
mantenere la testa fuori dall’acqua mentre controlla
i paraggi.

Nuota roteando le due code come fossero viti. Quando si
immerge, il suo galleggiante si sgonfia.

Gonfia il salvagente che ha attorno al collo per mantenere
la testa fuori dall’acqua mentre controlla i paraggi.

It has a flotation sac that is
like an inflatable collar. It floats
on water with its head out.

It swims by rotating its two tails
like a screw. When it dives, its
flotation sac collapses.

It spins its two tails like a screw
to propel itself through water. The
tails also slice clinging seaweed.

It inflates its flotation sac,
keeping its face above water in
order to watch for prey movement.

It inflates its flotation sac,
keeping its face above water in
order to watch for prey movement.

It spins its two tails like a screw
to propel itself through water. The
tails also slice clinging seaweed.

It spins its two tails like a screw
to propel itself through water. The
tails also slice clinging seaweed.

It inflates the flotation sac around
its neck and pokes its head out of
the water to see what is going on.

It inflates the flotation sac around
its neck and pokes its head out of
the water to see what is going on.

It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw.
When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and
pokes its head out of the water to see what is
going on.

It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw.
When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and
pokes its head out of the water to see what is
going on.

It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for
propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat
is coincidental.
